## State Labs â€“ Collab-Key
**Type:** MPC-TSS Key Management and Signing Infrastructure  
**Category:** Custody / Key Management  

**Description:**  
Collab-Key is a high-performance MPC-TSS framework supporting both two-party and multi-party ECDSA signing.  
Keys are generated and used collaboratively via secure two-party computation and threshold signatures, so no single party ever reconstructs a full private key.  
It integrates with existing KMS and client applications to deliver fast, production-grade signing for institutional wallets and custody providers.

**Tech Stack:**  
MPC, TSS (ECDSA 2PC / multi-party), Threshold Signatures

**Website:** https://statelabs.ai  
**Contact:** joezyx@statelabs.ai | kyle@statelabs.ai
